name: Scarlett Witch
description:
Scarlett Witch is a real Game Boy title featuring a Witch with the power to switch perspectives!

This is the final project I did for college, back in 2015. The goal was to develop a prototype using assembly code. I'm not sure if I will ever continue this project, but I would be super happy if you try it.

You can play it on an emulator or on you Game Boy console (using a flash cart). Also, if you play it on a Game Boy Color or Advance, it will display nice color palettes, and a smoother color grading effect when switching between perspectives.

Also, the source code is available on GitHub in case you're curious.

Hope you like it!

Credits:
Game + Art: Davitsu
Music + GBT Player: AntonioND
